title: Pixel 4 XL black screen with blinking
content:
After turn on and pass the google logo animation, the lock screen comes in black with the top bar shown time and battery icon with blinking only, i cannot fix it after hardreset/reboot/safe mode.

Same problem from another victims and the video has shown the problem
https://support.google.com/pixelphone/thread/18800467?hl=en
